document_data.caption: The Overmoor Trail highlighted in red.
document_data.name: Overmoor Trail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Overmoor Trail''' was a road found on the [[Dragon Coast]], that ran from [[Elversult]] northwest to [[Proskur]].
document_data.Geography: The trail connected the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] of [[Cormyr]], with the far-reaching [[Trader's Road]] of the Dragon Coast,{{Cite dragon/365/Backdrop: Cormyr|45}}
